message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to part with it for $800000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value and uniqueness of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $700000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product for $750000. It's a fair compromise considering its value and rarity.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $725000.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go below $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll counteroffer at $737500. It's the best I can do without compromising the product's value.
I respect your position, Alice. After further deliberation, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $730000.

Bob, I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll counteroffer at $742500. It's the lowest I'm willing to go without compromising the product's value.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $735000.

Bob, I'm not willing to go any lower than $742500. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'll meet you halfway again, so I'll counteroffer at $737250. This is my final offer.
Alice, I've done my best to find a middle ground. I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $732500.
